mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TEST (USER_NM, USER_USERNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PW, USER_PNUMBER, USER_ADDRESS, COMMON_CODE_PK, USER_BDATE, USER_PROVIDER, USER_PROVIDERID) VALUES (USER_PK_SEQ.nextval, #{USER_NM}, #{USER_NAME}, #{USER_EMAIL}, #{USER_PW}, #{USER_PNUMBER}, #{USER_ADDRESS}, #{COMMON_CODE_PK}, to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{USER_PROVIDER}, #{USER_PROVIDERID})
mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_PK, u.USER_NM, u.USER_USERNAME, u.USER_EMAIL, u.USER_PNUMBER, u.USER_ADDRESS, u.COMMON_CODE_PK, u.USER_BDATE, u.USER_PROVIDER, u.USER_PROVIDERID, c.COMMON_NAME AS ROLE_NAME FROM USER_TEST u JOIN COMMON_CODE_TEST c ON u.COMMON_CODE_PK = c.COMMON_CODE_PK WHERE u.USER_NM = #{userName}
